document_notes.text:
This update for libqt4 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-15518: Fixed a double free in QXmlStreamReader (bsc#1118595)
- CVE-2018-19873: Fixed a segmantation fault via a malformed 
  BMP file (bsc#1118596).
- CVE-2018-19869: Fixed an improper checking which might lead to
  a crach via a malformed url reference (bsc#1118599).
- Added stricter toplevel asm parsing by dropping volatile 
  qualification that has no effect (bsc#1121214).
document_notes.title: Details

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: An issue was discovered in Qt before 5.11.3. A malformed SVG image causes a segmentation fault in qsvghandler.cpp.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

notes.text: An issue was discovered in Qt before 5.11.3. QBmpHandler has a buffer overflow via BMP data.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
